[docs]    def test_userRegister(self):       
        userRegister_res = _default_authorization.userRegister(username=testing_data['test_register_username'], email=testing_data['test_register_email'], password=testing_data['test_register_password'])
        assert userRegister_res == {'password': 'please create password between 8 chars and 40 chars'}
